glosses: to be aware of, to realize, to notice

examples.text: Fate var farkına gençliğinin / Ve de farkına var neyi seçtiğinin
examples.translation: Fate, be aware that you’re young / And be aware of what you’ve chosen

etymology: By surface analysis, fark (“difference”) + -ı + -na + var- (“to arrive, to reach”) + -mak.
